pr_title: ConnectionString : Default scheme to SB:// in Endpoint if not specified

timeline.bodyText:
Not the code change of this PR. But eventHubName might mislead users. It can be either an eventhub or servicebus it's it's an azure-core class.
And EntityPath is optional in the endpoint.
timeline.author: YijunXieMS
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,6 +29,8 @@
     private static final String ERROR_MESSAGE_FORMAT = "Could not parse 'connectionString'. Expected format: "
         + "'Endpoint={endpoint};SharedAccessKeyName={sharedAccessKeyName};"
         + "SharedAccessKey={sharedAccessKey};EntityPath={eventHubName}'. Actual: %s";

replies.bodyText: entityPath is common across both. I will use that.
replies.author: hemanttanwar
